projectmanager.ui
Class Screen

java.lang.Object
  projectmanager.ui.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseActivityScreen, ChooseWorkWeekScreen, CreateProjectScreen, EditRegisteredTimeScreen, LoginScreen, MainMenuScreen, ManageProjectScreen, ProjectMenuScreen, RegisterTimeScreen, SeeYourTimeScreen, TimeMenuScreen
abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object

Class that represents any screen being displayed to the user in the UI. Subclasses must be created for every screen.

          Number of characters that has been outputted

          Message being displayed when input selection is wrong

                                    throws java.io.IOException

Parameters:
